title: Social Dynamics

questions.text: When we're out with friends or in a group, I'd love it if we...
choices: Tag-team the conversations and work the room together
Stick close and experience it as a pair
Do our own thing but check in throughout
Have a signal for when one of us is ready to leave
Other / It depends

questions.text: When I'm going through something hard, what helps most from you is...
choices: Practical suggestions or help solving it
Just listening and letting me vent
Asking questions to help me think it through
Distraction - help me take my mind off it
Other / It depends

questions.text: The social situations where I feel most comfortable with you are...
choices: Big gatherings with lots of energy
Smaller groups of close friends
Double dates or hanging with one other couple
Just the two of us, honestly
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we're making plans with friends and can't all agree, I think we should...
choices: Just pick something and go with it
Keep discussing until everyone's happy
Let whoever cares most decide
Split up and do different things if needed
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we're with our friends, I see us as the couple who...
choices: Makes things happen - we organize and bring people together
Brings the fun - we're up for anything
Is easy to be around - chill and go-with-the-flow
Has the deep conversations - people open up to us
Other / It depends

description: Explore how you show up together in your social world.
